text: getting betteri don t know where else to post this  but i chose here since i frequent a lot  i recently just finished  i think lol  the hardest period of my life  i survived an overdose and got out of a really  really toxic relationship  i have a job that i do pretty decent in  making a solid amount of money for my age  i think i finally sorted out my gender identity issues  and generally i just feel okay  maybe i only feel better at the moment  maybe i ll feel better for longer who knows  i just feel proud of myself for hanging on for this long  i dont know how i did it but im happy i did  but i have bipolar i so this could also easily be the beginning of a manic episode lol  either way  i just wanted to update anyone whos seen me on here that im doing better  i hope the rest of you do too
summary: I survived an overdose and got out of a toxic relationship. I have a job that I like and I think I've finally sorted out my gender identity issues. I'm bipolar and it could be the beginning of a manic episode.
cleaned: survive overdose get toxic relationship job like think finally sort gender identity issue bipolar beginning manic episode

text: I think about suicide a lotI m contemplating suicide more and more as I continue to live my life dealing with my perpetual loneliness and crippling depression  I ve considered just ending it  then losing interest and continuing on with life  Now I find myself thinking about suicide every other day almost  I think about it in a nice way  I feel like it would be calm and peaceful  life is too fucking stressful  Does anyone else think about this stuff  i can t be alone  I always think it would be nice for me  but then peeps I know wouldn t understand and be like upset and I don t want that for them  I only really have my family which care about me  so I guess I should stay alive for their sake  I mean it would be kind of a waste of money feeding me all these years if I just killed myself  It s bizzar really coz I m like a vegan  non alcoholic  don t smoke  exercise semi regularly   really healthy guy yet I only think about death   I d talk to a friend or family member about this but they d just either report me to some social service people  a psych ward  or just burst into tears   it s not like that  I aint sad  I just can t be arsed living anymore  it s like I need some fucking motivation to keep living or some shit  Any words from fellow human beings would be nice   I can answer questions also
summary: I'm depressed and lonely. I think about suicide every other day. I don't want to be alone. I'm vegan, non-alcoholic, and exercise semi-regularly. I would talk to a friend or family member about it, but they would either report me to a psych ward or burst into tears.

text: I Don t Wanna Be Here AnymoreI never talked on here before I have pretty bad aniexty and I m super shy so it s super hard for me to write anywhere not looking for anyone to respond just needed somewhere to vent cause I m really struggling I ve dealt with depression since I was   and that was the first time I tried to kill myself with sleeping pills of course it didn t work so after I started cutting I didn t have the best childhood constantly moving from motel to motel my family is very dysfunctional always arguing nonstop i was never open with my family about my depression I always kept it to myself till recently but even now my family thinks I m just begging for attention I just feel so worthless I don t feel I belong here I honestly feel I was a mistake to ever be born my mom even told me when I was   I was a mistake and recently told me if I wanted to kill myself go do it I know I m not alone but I feel so alone I feel like no one would care if I just disappeared I feel so pathetic I m   now I can t hold a job if my life depended on it I m lesbian but never been with a girl cuz I m to scared to even talk to a girl cuz of my horrible aniexty and shyness I never leave home anymore I just feel this world would be better off if I wasn t in it im tired of just feeling all this pain I m tired of crying myself to sleep I just want it all to end I know people say it will get better but I don t think it will I m sorry if I was a burden I just needed to vent or I would bottle it up I figured this be better
summary: I don't want to be here any more. I have depression and anxiety. I tried to kill myself once, but it didn't work. My family thinks I'm just begging for attention. I can't hold a job and I'm afraid to talk to girls.
cleaned: not want depression anxiety try kill not work family think beg attention not hold job afraid talk girl
